title: C-Pen 32GB USB-C Drive—Red
description:
The C-Pen 2-1 is a writing and digital storage experience: a refillable ballpoint pen with a 32 GB USB-C memory drive thoughtfully engineered into the pen cap. 32 GB of memory allows you to store and transfer up to 4000 pictures, 7000 songs, or 40 hours of video. Compatible with computers, tablets, and smartphones with a USB-C port.

  • Dimensions: 0.43 x 5.90 in.
  • Black ink refillable ballpoint pen with USB-C flash memory
  • 32GB capacity - save up to 4,000 pictures, 7,000 songs, 40h of video
  • 5V/0.5A
  • Compatible with Windows 7,8 & 10, Mac OS X v10.6 and higher
